info.title: City Travel Platform API
info.description: API documentation for City-Based Travel Platform with booking, payment, and content management capabilities

post.description: Create a new user account with email and password
Obtain JWT access and refresh tokens
Blacklist refresh token to logout user

Takes a refresh type JSON web token and returns an access type JSON web
token if the refresh token is valid.

get.description: Get details of currently authenticated user

patch.description: Update details of currently authenticated user

post.description: Create a temporary guest user for booking without full registration
Send OTP for login or verification
Login with Phone and OTP
Initiate password reset via SMS OTP
Reset password using SMS OTP
Change password for currently authenticated user
Synchronize OAuth user data from NextAuth.js frontend with Django backend. Creates or updates user and returns JWT tokens.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific city by ID.
Retrieve comprehensive city information including highlights, travel tips, articles, and packages for a specific city.

parameters.description: Package slug identifier

value.pricing_note: This is an estimate. Final price calculated at checkout.

value.error: Duplicate experience IDs are not allowed
All experience IDs must be valid integers
One or more experiences not found or inactive

get.description: Get estimated price range for a package based on available components.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Package slug identifier

value.note: Prices are estimates and may vary based on selected components and active promotions

get.description:
Retrieve a paginated list of active travel experiences.
        
        **Filtering:**
        - `city`: Filter by city ID
        - `category`: Filter by category (CULTURAL, ADVENTURE, FOOD, SPIRITUAL, NATURE, ENTERTAINMENT, EDUCATIONAL)
        - `difficulty_level`: Filter by difficulty (EASY, MODERATE, HARD)
        - `min_price`: Minimum price filter
        - `max_price`: Maximum price filter
        - `search`: Search in name and description
        
        **Sorting:**
        - `ordering`: Sort by field (name, base_price, created_at, duration_hours)
        - Prefix with `-` for descending order (e.g., `-base_price`)
        
        **Caching:** Responses cached for 5 minutes

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Filter by category

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Filter by city ID

parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

post.description: Calculate booking price with traveler details WITHOUT creating a booking. Used on review page to show accurate age-based pricing.
PHASE 3: Get intelligent room allocation recommendations based on traveler composition (age, gender). Analyzes group dynamics and suggests optimal room configurations.

put.description: Update booking details. CONFIRMED bookings cannot be modified.

parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this booking.

ViewSet for managing traveler profiles with comprehensive validation

Endpoints:
- GET /api/travelers/ - List all travelers for current user
- POST /api/travelers/ - Create new traveler
- GET /api/travelers/{id}/ - Get specific traveler
- PUT /api/travelers/{id}/ - Update traveler
- PATCH /api/travelers/{id}/ - Partial update
- DELETE /api/travelers/{id}/ - Delete traveler
- GET /api/travelers/search/?q=query - Search travelers

Security:
- Authentication required
- Rate limited to 100 requests/hour per user
- Input validation and sanitization
- XSS protection

Booking.description: Read-only serializer for displaying bookings with complete price breakdown

booking_date.description: DEPRECATED: Use booking_start_date instead. Kept for backward compatibility.

traveler_details.description: List of traveler information: [{name, age, gender}, ...]

total_amount_paid.description: Total amount paid by customer (per_person_price  chargeable_travelers). This is the actual amount charged to the customer.

expires_at.description: Expiration time for DRAFT bookings (auto-set to 20 minutes after creation)

BookingCreateRequest.description:
Create serializer: DOES NOT accept total_price.
Price calculated entirely on backend.

room_preferences.description: User's room preferences or special requests for accommodation

traveler_details.description: List of traveler details: [{name, age, gender}, ...]

BookingCreateResponse.description: Compact booking response for successful booking creation.

total_amount_paid.description: Total amount paid by customer (per_person_price  chargeable_travelers). This is the actual amount charged to the customer.

draft_data.description:
Complete draft state:
        {
            "packageId": int,
            "experiences": [int],
            "days": int,
            "dateRange": {"start": str, "end": str},
            "travellers": [{"id": str, "name": str, "age": int, "gender": str, "isChild": bool}],
            "hotelTier": int,
            "rooms": [{"id": str, "type": str, "occupants": [str]}],
            "vehicles": [{"id": str, "type": str, "passengers": [str]}],
            "pricingEstimate": {"base": float, "experiences": float, "totalEstimate": float},
            "status": str,
            "versionToken": str
        }

migrated_from_local.description: True if this draft was migrated from localStorage

version.description: Incremented on each update for optimistic locking

CategoryEnum.description:
* `CULTURAL` - Cultural
* `ADVENTURE` - Adventure
* `FOOD` - Food & Culinary
* `SPIRITUAL` - Spiritual
* `NATURE` - Nature & Wildlife
* `ENTERTAINMENT` - Entertainment
* `EDUCATIONAL` - Educational

Complete draft state:
        {
            "packageId": int,
            "experiences": [int],
            "days": int,
            "dateRange": {"start": str, "end": str},
            "travellers": [{"id": str, "name": str, "age": int, "gender": str, "isChild": bool}],
            "hotelTier": int,
            "rooms": [{"id": str, "type": str, "occupants": [str]}],
            "vehicles": [{"id": str, "type": str, "passengers": [str]}],
            "pricingEstimate": {"base": float, "experiences": float, "totalEstimate": float},
            "status": str,
            "versionToken": str
        }

migrated_from_local.description: True if this draft was migrated from localStorage
